articles.description: It was too little, too late, and may fail to save a presidency imploding at staggering speed under the weight of Donald Trump's tragic flaws.

articles.author: Analysis by Oliver Darcy, CNN Business
articles.title: Analysis: TV providers should not escape scrutiny for distributing disinformation
articles.description: A version of this article first appeared in the "Reliable Sources" newsletter.

articles.author: Mary Kay Mallonee and Paul LeBlanc, CNN
articles.title: US Capitol Police confirm death of officer after pro-Trump riot
articles.description: The US Capitol Police confirmed the death of one of their officers late Thursday from injuries suffered when a mob of President Donald Trump's supporters stormed the Capitol a day before.

articles.author: Travis Caldwell and Megan Thomas, CNN
articles.title: 'Police Academy' and Broadway star Marion Ramsey dies at 73
articles.description: Marion Ramsey, the actress best known for her role as Officer Laverne Hooks in the film franchise "Police Academy," died Thursday in Los Angeles at the age of 73, according to a statement to CNN from manager Roger Paul. No cause of death was given.

articles.author: Rhea Mogul, CNN
articles.title: Cows are sacred in India. Critics say a new national exam politicizes the animal
articles.description: India has introduced a nationwide "Cow Science" exam to "infuse curiosity" about the bovine in the latest push by the country's Hindu-nationalist government to promote the sacred animal.

articles.title: The latest on the coronavirus pandemic and vaccines
articles.description: The coronavirus pandemic has brought countries to a standstill. Meanwhile, vaccinations have already started in some countries as cases continue to rise. Follow here for the latest.

articles.author: Jessie Yeung and Eric Cheung, CNN
articles.title: Hong Kong pro-democracy activist Joshua Wong arrested under national security law
articles.description: Hong Kong pro-democracy activist Joshua Wong was arrested Thursday over an alleged violation of the city's national security law, just a day after police arrested dozens of former lawmakers and opposition activists.

articles.author: Jill Disis, CNN Business
articles.title: Hyundai stock skyrockets on reports it is in early talks with Apple to build a car
articles.description: Hyundai's stock is on pace for its best day in at least two decades on reports that the South Korean automaker is in early talks with Apple to develop self-driving electric cars.

articles.author: Kristin Wilson, Evan Perez, David Brooks and Paul LeBlanc, CNN
articles.title: Capitol Police officer on life support after pro-Trump riot, union official says
articles.description: A Capitol Police officer is on life support Thursday night after a mob of President Donald Trump's supporters stormed the US Capitol a day before, according to Capitol Police union chair Gus Papathanasiou.

articles.title: People at the US Capitol riot are being identified and losing their jobs
articles.description: At least three men have lost their jobs as a result of their involvement in the unrest at the US Capitol Wednesday.

articles.title: Radical cleric linked to Bali bombings released from prison
articles.description: Indonesia released Islamic cleric Abu Bakar Bashir from prison on Friday, with authorities saying the suspected mastermind of the 2002 Bali bombings would enter a de-radicalization program amid concerns over his continued influence in extremist circles.

articles.title: A second Trump impeachment vs. the 25th Amendment
articles.description: Here's a list of consequential things that happened Thursday in relatively short succession:

articles.author: Jill Disis, CNN Business
articles.title: Samsung says profits are rising, but smartphone competition is fierce
articles.description: Samsung predicts its profits rose nearly 26% last quarter. That suggests demand for many of its products has kept up during the coronavirus pandemic even as it faces tough competition in the smartphone market.

articles.title: Hear why Klobuchar fist-bumped Pence after Electoral certification
articles.description: Sen. Amy Klobuchar (D-MN), tells CNN's Chris Cuomo about the moment Congress finalized President-elect Joe Biden's victory, and about why she chose to fist-bump Vice President Mike Pence after he read the election results.

articles.title: Education Secretary Betsy DeVos second Cabinet member to resign over Trump's response to the riot
Hear from ITV reporter who was inside US Capitol during riots
articles.description: CNN's Erin Burnett speaks with Robert Moore, a Washington correspondent with ITN News, who was inside the Capitol building during the deadly riot at the US Capitol.

articles.title: Trump's Education Secretary Betsy DeVos submits resignation

articles.title: Kai Suites, Singapore: A luxury hotel for new parents (and their babies)

articles.title: How the US Capitol riot unfolded, minute by minute
articles.description: As Congress convened to begin the certification process for President-elect Joe Biden's victory, thousands of Trump supporters gathered near the White House to hear the president speak. Watch the events that led to rioters storming the US Capitol.
